# flan-t5-cbp-lkg-corpus-w-context-small-finetuned

[flan-t5-cbp-lkg-corpus-mlm-small](https://huggingface.co/kinshuk-h/flan-t5-cbp-lkg-corpus-mlm-small) finetuned over a cleaned version of the Legal Knowledge Graph using the training method for [KGT-5](https://github.com/apoorvumang/kgt5/) with additional context supplied alongside the prompts.
